Trade/Device Name(s): FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor, Clone PgR 636, Ready-to-Use, (Link)
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) human breast carcinoma tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dako FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor, Clone PgR 636, Ready-to-Use antibody for IHC detection of progesterone receptor in breast carcinoma tissue
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in immunohistochemistry with EnVision FLEX+, High pH visualization kit and Autostainer Link 48 to semi-quantitatively detect human progesterone receptor in FFPE breast carcinoma, aiding in assessment of progesterone receptor status
